source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a narrow, dark alleyway. The camera starts by looking up at a brick building, then tilts down to reveal the alley. The camera then moves forward through the alley toward the brighter street at the end.

generated_critique:
The feedback is based on the following imagined video content:
*The video begins with a high-angle shot of a brick building, then the camera pulls back and tilts down to reveal a dark, narrow alley. A person in a dark coat is walking away from the camera down the center of the alley toward a brightly lit street at the far end. On the distant street, cars and buses can be seen driving past from left to right. As the camera continues to move backward through the alley, a piece of newspaper on the ground flutters in the wind.*

***

This caption incorrectly describes the camera's movement rather than the motion of the subjects within the video, which is the primary requirement. The description completely omits the main subject, a person who is walking down the alley away from the camera. It also fails to mention the secondary motion visible on the bright street at the end of the alley, where vehicles are likely passing by. A more accurate description would focus on the person's action of walking through the alley and could also include details about the movement of the cars on the distant street or even minor environmental motion, such as a piece of paper fluttering on the ground, to provide a complete picture of the action in the scene.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The video begins with a high-angle shot of a brick building before the camera pulls back and tilts down to reveal a dark, narrow alley. A person in a dark coat walks away from the camera down the center of the alley toward a brightly lit street at the far end. On the distant street, cars and buses drive past from left to right. As the camera continues to move backward through the alley, a piece of newspaper on the ground flutters in the wind.
